commit.message:
locale_facets.tcc (__convert_from_v): Replace strdup with ISO malloc and strcpy.

	* include/bits/locale_facets.tcc (__convert_from_v):
	Replace strdup with ISO malloc and strcpy.

From-SVN: r56991

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	* include/bits/locale_facets.tcc (__convert_from_v):
+	Replace strdup with ISO malloc and strcpy.
+
